reviewText: When I received the tape I took it to the computer store & had it converted to DVD. It really has helped in my learning how to restore composition dolls & makes the job much nicer. I recommend it to anyone who is wanting to learn to restore the old composition dolls. It is in a format that is easy to understand. The Dr. tells you what items you need to purchase in order to complete your project, therefor I highly recommend it to anyone.
